Text.Page:
Every floor of this place swarms with nightmarish creatures.

The {@LinkCreature:33#5#cursed jesters} seem like the worst...until you meet the {@LinkCreature:33#51#moppet butchers}.

And if you meet both clowns and dolls at the same time, good luck sleeping. Go ahead! Try and kill them.
You're alive? Huh. Guess you're made of sterner stuff than I thought. Just goes toâ€”IS THAT A DOLL WITH A KNIFE BEHIND YOU?!
